sentences.en: Blue and green eyeshadow has long been considered kitsch.
sentences.cn: 蓝色和绿色的眼影一直被认为是俗气的。

sentences.en: Collectors of Fifties kitsch should pop over to Brussels for the flea market.
sentences.cn: 50年代庸俗艺术作品的收藏者应该到布鲁塞尔的跳蚤市场去看看。

sentences.en: In the realm of totalitarian kitsch , all answers are given in advance and preclude any questions.
sentences.cn: 在极权主义的庸俗作品里, 所有的答案都提前给出并产生了新的问题.

sentences.en: That new lamp they've bought is pure kitsch.
sentences.cn: 他们新买的那盏灯真俗气.

sentences.en: The brotherhood of man on earth will be possible only on a base of kitsch.
sentences.cn: 地球上人的博爱将只可能以媚俗作态为基础.

sentences.en: This kitsch sells like mad in the big cities.
sentences.cn: 这本小说在大城市里畅销.

trans.tran_cn: 粗劣的作品，俗气的艺术、设计等，迎合低级趣味的作品
